meanings.definition: Items given away at no cost.
meanings.sent1: At the event, they were handing out freebies like pens and stickers.
meanings.sent2: I love going to the store opening for the freebies they give out.
meanings.sent3: The freebies at the conference were so popular that people lined up for them.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a freebie, brightening up everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The freebies were like little treasures, making the experience even more enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: The hotel offers freebies like breakfast and Wi-Fi to all guests.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the freebies that come with my magazine subscription.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the best part of the job was the freebies in the break room.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a freebie, always willing to help without expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent5: The freebies were like little surprises, making the day brighter.

meanings.sent1: The airline offers freebies like snacks and drinks during the flight.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy staying at hotels that provide freebies such as toiletries and slippers.
meanings.sent3: The freebies at the spa made the pampering experience even more luxurious.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was a freebie, helping me without asking for anything in return.
meanings.sent5: The freebies were like small gifts, adding a special touch to the service.
